name: BeesFeeds The Game The visual novel The dating sim The musical The quiz
name_original: BeesFeeds The Game The visual novel The dating sim The musical The quiz
description:
Welcome to BeesFeeds the Game

The visual novel

The dating sim

The musical (not actually a musical sorry)

The quiz!

In this short visual novel you will be guided through a completely normal, regular, ordinary day of your life, in which nothing in particular happens  and we will tell you which of our four cute girlfriends is the right one for you! Take the quiz now and find your true love!
